Package geometry.wheelshape

Class WheelGeometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • scene.SceneElement
      • geometry.Geometry
        • geometry.wheelshape.WheelGeometry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barrel, Circle, Diamond, Egg, Ellipse, Football, Heart, RegularNGon, Shield, Star, Teardrop, Trapezoid

    public abstract class WheelGeometry
extends Geometry
    This class defines common behavior for wheel shapes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WheelGeometry

        public WheelGeometry(java.util.List<GeometryPoint> penPoints)
        Handles the location of penPoints on a wheel's shape. Transformations on the wheel's scale and roation in the scene graph will also adjust the location of these pen points.
        Parameters:
        penPoints - list of location within the shape where a pen can be placed
